name: RUNNERIST
description:
RUNNERIST A game by BumbleBirds

Run as far as you can, as fast as you can. Don't stop for any reason!

A game made for Ludum Dare #26. The theme was Minimalism.

We tried to make an entire game using only 1 button (space) and a very limited colour palette.


Controls

Everything: Space

Thanks for playing!
